import React from 'react' import Hero from '../components/Hero' import Content from '../components/Content' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' class ContactPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { name: '', email: '', message: '', disabled: false, emailSent: null } } render() { return (
Full Name Email message
); } } export default ContactPage;
